objects.name: HowP
objects.string:
This is how you play. 
1st - Click the button.
2nd - Earn points (To upgrade).
3rd -  "TAB" for book. "Q" to close

Note!
this might be outdated!

objects.name: How2Paly
objects.string:
1 of the main item(s) is "KEYS" you 
will need them. For Multiple uses.
USE YOUR BOOK FOR CRAFTING!
Press "E" for a in-game example.

Note!
When you LEFT click "KEYS" will 
come to the position you mouse is at!

objects.name: Grabaaaa
objects.string: Grab the "KEY" and put it into the lock....
